snippet: It was the second such statement denying that Mokhtar Belmokhtar, the man behind the 2013 seizure of an Algerian gas plant that left 38 hostages dead, had been killed.
abstract: Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb denies that jihadist leader Mokhtar Belmokhtar was killed in American airstrike in Libya; Belmokhtar is accused of being mastermind behind 2013 terrorist seizure of Algerian gas plant.
lead_paragraph: It was the second such statement denying that Mokhtar Belmokhtar, the man behind the 2013 seizure of an Algerian gas plant that left 38 hostages dead, had been killed.

headline.main: Al Qaeda Denies U.S. Strike Killed Key Jihadist in Libya
headline.print_headline: Al Qaeda Denies U.S. Strike Killed Key Jihadist in Libya
